Text: Thanks. Could you please upload more of Mileena Hayes, Amber Priddy, Ashley Logan or Suzi Q?
You know how you said First Come, First Serve. Well serve us up with Rosee Divine: Got Molly

@Butyluvin OK...Lets get somethings clear. 

1) I "serve" only whomever I feel like servin'.

2) First Come, First Serve was done in the last post and it looks like you missed it.

3) All new videos that's posted on BSL site are uploaded only one part at a time. Meanin' when you go in the members area to view these new videos, only up to a certain number of parts will be available. All the parts to that scene won't be available in BSL members area until after some weeks have passed and the number of weeks will depend on how many parts were made for that scene. So just because you see "View Full HD Video" in the promo area, that's not really true for the new videos because the "Full" video won't be available. Call it a scam, (I know I would) just to get people to become members on that site by leadin' them to believe these full videos are available in the members area when clearly they are not once you have paid for membership. Also you won't be able to download these videos, (as mentioned as a benefit for becomin' a full member) in the members area either, but that's another story. I'm just lettin' you know some of the lies that's bein' told if you ever decide to get a membership to BSL website.

So hopefully this clear somethings up, and now you can continue to enjoy these videos that I'm able to share with you.
